## mtcars data
```{r, comment = ""}
library(datasets)
data("mtcars")
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
str(mtcars)
```

```{r, comment = ""}
library(plotly)
```

## MPG in Scatterplot
```{r, echo=FALSE}
mtcars$gear <- factor(mtcars$gear, levels = c(3, 4, 5), 
                      labels = c("gear = 3", "gear = 4", "gear = 5"))
mtcars$am <- factor(mtcars$am, levels = c(0, 1), labels = c("automatic", "manual"))
plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~disp, y = ~mpg, mode = "markers", type = "scatter", color = ~as.factor(mtcars$gear), size = ~wt, split = ~as.factor(mtcars$am))
```

## MPG in Boxplots
```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot_ly(mtcars, y = ~mpg, color = ~(as.factor(cyl)), type = "box")
```

##  MPG in Surface
```{r, echo=FALSE}
mtcars$mpg <- as.vector(mtcars$mpg)
data <- matrix(sort(mtcars$mpg), nrow = 8, ncol = 4)
plot_ly(z = data, type = "surface")
```
